snippet: The inquiry into the former senior officer, Lt. Gen. Gu Junshan, found that he had bought military promotions and pocketed millions of dollars through procurement contracts.
abstract: Chinese military court issues suspended death sentence to former officer Lt Gen Gu Junshan on charges that include bribery, embezzlement and abuse of power.
lead_paragraph: The inquiry into the former senior officer, Lt. Gen. Gu Junshan, found that he had bought military promotions and pocketed millions of dollars through procurement contracts.

headline.main: Ex-Officer in Chinese Army Receives Suspended Death Sentence in Graft Case
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Former Army Official Is Sentenced in Corruption Case
